last_episode_to_air.name: Fin for the Win
last_episode_to_air.overview: Merfolk compete to see who'll be crowned the King and Queen of the Sea. Weeki Wachee Springs' 75th anniversary brings together mermaids — and friends.

name: MerPeople
overview: Welcome to the whimsical world of professional mermaiding, where people's passion for swimming in fins has exploded into a half-billion-dollar industry.

episodes.name: No Dead Mermaids
episodes.overview: A landlocked mermaid struggles to find work. Former Weeki Wachee mermaids reminisce about the glory days. A merman tail maker opens his dream aquarium.

episodes.name: Pack Your Tail, Sweetie
episodes.overview: The Mertailor holds auditions for his aquarium. The Sea King of South Carolina films a music video. Merfolk attend MerMagic Con. Sparkles takes a risk.

episodes.name: Fly Free, Little Fishy
episodes.overview: Sparkles worries about performing in a cold-water tank. The Blixunami takes over Times Square in NYC. The Mertailor puts on a costly Halloween show.

episodes.name: Fin for the Win
episodes.overview: Merfolk compete to see who'll be crowned the King and Queen of the Sea. Weeki Wachee Springs' 75th anniversary brings together mermaids — and friends.
